thread.title: Fire destroys St. Charles area country club
thread.title_full: Fire destroys St. Charles area country club

author: From Staff Reports
title: Fire destroys St. Charles area country club
text:
2 hrs ago ( … ) 
A fire destroyed the Bogey Hills Country Club in St. Charles County early Friday morning, according to a Facebook post from the Central County Fire and Rescue. (Photo via of the department's Facebook) 
A fire destroyed the Bogey Hills Country Club in St. Charles County early Friday morning, according to a Facebook post from the Central County Fire and Rescue. (Photo via of the department's Facebook) 
ST. CHARLES COUNTY • Firefighters in St. Charles County are still on the scene Friday morning of a fire that destroyed an area country club. 
Just before midnight Thursday, firefighters from Central County Fire and Rescue were dispatched to Bogey Hills Country Club. Video and photos from the department's Facebook page show the extent of the fire. 
The building is a total loss, according to the department's Facebook. 
The club's general manager, Angel Walters Likens, thanked fire crews and supporters in a public Facebook post early Friday morning. 
"I am crushed but know that God will lead me. Thank you to everyone for all your support," she said. Walters Likens couldn't be reached for additional comment. Tags
